frontmatter.title: Join the Journey of Iris: Building a Multilingual Voice Assistant with OpenAI and Picovoice
frontmatter.description: Dive into the creation of Iris, a multilingual voice assistant that combines OpenAI's GPT models and Picovoice's Porcupine for keyword detection. Discover how you can contribute to this unique blend of advanced AI capabilities and user-friendly interaction.
